pollId.description:
Poll ID, 
can be obtained via DiscussionThread/getThread['poll']['id']

answerId.description:
Answer ID, 
can be obtained via DiscussionThread/getThread['poll']['answers'][n]['id']

If given, will list the voters for that answer.
If not given, will list all voters for that poll.

pollId.description:
Poll ID,

answerIds.description:
Answer ID (a single one despite the name of the parameter), 
can be obtained via DiscussionThread/getThread['poll']['answers'][n]['id']

Changing vote is possible.
An invalid or empty ID will remove the vote from any particular answer but will still keep the user in the overall list of voters.
